app.name: Splatfest DL
app.long_description:
Run the IOSU Exploit before running this!
Hold L while running this app to remove the current Custom Splatfest!
This tool allows you to play custom Splatfests in Splatoon. For more information, join my discord server at https://discord.gg/HcQKQUG. I am not responsible if anything bad happens. You can only play Splatfest Battles with SplatfestDL when a Splatfest is happening.
